title: Adding your resume info
subtitle: Import your resume or add your info individually
description: Add your resume automatically using our import tool, or use the + button on the My Info page to add your work, education, and achievement history.

steps: Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the Import My Resume button at the top of the page.
Select the file from your computer.
Verify the information imported from your resume is correct in cards added to Work, Education, or Achievements.
Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the (+) button at the top of the page (bottom of the page if on mobile).
Use the tabs at the top of the popup to choose which type of information to add (Work & Volunteering, Education, or Achievements & Activities).
Fill out pertinent fields. Note that the required fields are marked below the input.
Click 'Add' at the bottom of the popup.
A new popup will appear, which you can use to add Accomplishments (statements about what you accomplished or duties you performed in that particular position).
You can add multiple Accomplishments at once by separating them onto a new line.
Click 'Save & Close' to close the popup, or click 'Save & Add More' to add more Accomplishments.
Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the card that includes the information you want to edit.
Edit the information in the fields provided.
Click 'Save'.
To edit an Accomplishment, click on the Accomplishment you want to update.
Edit the Accomplishment in the popup, and click 'Save'.
You can also re-order your Accomplishments by dragging them within a card.
Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the card that you want to delete.
Click 'Delete'.
Click 'Delete Permanently'.
To delete just an Accomplishment, click on the Accomplishment you want to delete.
Click 'Delete'.
Click 'Delete Permanently'.
